values.name: Kick
values.description:
A simple kick.
A basic medium-damage attack, with a 1:2 damage to cost ratio.
values.moveMessage: {sender} kicks {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly kicks {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} but {target} blocks it, taking {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} kicks {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} swiftly kicks {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to kick {target} but falls on the ground and loses {move:hpF neg} {hp.ext_full}.

values.name: Jab
values.description:
A quick punch.
An easy low-damage attack, with a low chance of countering.
values.moveMessage: {sender} jabs {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly jabs {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} but {target} blocks it, taking {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} jabs {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} swiftly jabs {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to jab {target} but misses.

values.name: Sword
values.description:
Slash with a sword.
A strong weapon with high {st.ext_full} costs but a slightly better damage
to cost ratio (1:2), and a small chance to deal a critical,
potentially one-shot blow.
values.moveMessage: {sender} strikes {target} with a sword for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a sword for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword but {target} blocks it, taking only {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword and {target} fails to block, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword but {target} dodges it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword and {target} fails to dodge, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and critically strikes {target} with a sword for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
Too slow!
{sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and critically strikes {target} with a sword for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and bypasses {target}'s block with a sword, critically striking them for {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and predicts {target}'s dodge, critically striking them for {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to strike {target} with a sword but falls on the ground and hits themselves for {move:hpF neg} damage.

values.name: Fire Ball
values.description:
Summon a fireball.
A standard, medium-damage attack that costs {mp.ext_full}.
values.moveMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} shoots a FAST ball of fire at {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} but {target} blocks it, taking {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} shoots a DEADLY ball of fire at {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a FAST AND DEADLY ball of fire at {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a DEADLY ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a DEADLY ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot a ball of fire but it explodes in their face for {move:hpF neg} damage!

values.name: Slam
values.description:
Slam down on your foe.
A move with high variability in damage output but with luck,
offers 25 damage at 40 {st.ext_full} cost instead of 50 (1:2 ratio).
values.moveMessage: {sender} jumps above {target} and slams down for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly jumps above {target} and slams down for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} but {target} blocks it, taking only {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} but {target} dodges it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to dodge it, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} slams down on {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} critical damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly slams down on {target} for {move:hpCrit neg} critical damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} critical damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to dodge it, taking {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} critical damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} but hits the ground, losing {move:hpF neg} {hp.ext_full}!

values.name: Knife
values.description:
Slash with a knife.
A medium-damage weapon that is dangerous to counter, and has a
relatively high critical chance.
values.moveMessage: {sender} slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries slashing {target} with a knife but {target} blocks, dealing only {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to block, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries slashing {target} with a knife but {target} dodged it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to dodge, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} swiftly slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to dodge, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries slashing {target} with a knife but hits themself, dealing {move:hpF neg} damage.

values.name: Throw Knife
values.description:
Throw a knife.
A medium-damage weapon, boasting a high critical chance,
but requires you to dispose a knife.
It is harder to block than to evade, but failing evasion is worse.
values.moveMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly throws a knife at {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} who is blocking, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to block, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} throws a knife at {target}, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} swiftly throws a knife at {target}, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to throw a knife at {target} but hits themself, dealing {move:hpF neg} damage.

values.name: Longbow
values.description:
Fire an arrow with a longbow.
A medium-damage weapon that requires a lot of {st.ext_full}, but will deal
moderate {st.ext_full} damage.
values.moveMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage and draining {move:st neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly shoots an arrow at {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage and draining {move:st neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} but {target} blocks it, only dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage and draining {move:stBlockF neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage and draining {move:stEvadeF neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} critically strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage and draining {move:stCrit neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} critically and swiftly strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage and draining {move:stCrit neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to block and {sender} critically strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage and draining {move:stBlockFCrit neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to evade and {sender} critically strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage and draining {move:stEvadeFCrit neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot an arrow at {target} but hits themself, losing {move:hpF neg} {hp.ext_full} and {move:stF neg} {st.ext_full}.

values.name: Equilibrium
values.description:
Convert 25 {hp.ext_full} into magicka- {mp.ext_full}.
This move is uncounterable; the opponent cannot stop this process.
there is a 1/10 chance of failing, which takes away both {hp.ext_full}
and {mp.ext_full}.
values.fastMessage: {sender} uses Equilibrium, losing {move:hpC neg} {hp.ext_full} for {move:mpC} {mp.ext_full}!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries using Equilibrium but it backfires, making {sender} lose {int(move.fmt('hpF neg')) + int(move.fmt('hpC neg'))} {hp.ext_full} and {move:mpF neg} {mp.ext_full}.

values.name: Bobomb
values.description:
Throw a bob-omb.
A bob-omb is hefty to throw, but is powerful and hard to evade.
values.moveMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} but {target} blocks, dealing only {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes right next to them, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} critical damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes right next to them, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} critical damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb right next to {target} and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} critical damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb right next to {target} and {target} fails to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} critical damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to throw a bob-omb at {target} but the bob-omb explodes next to {sender}, dealing {move:hpF neg} damage!

values.name: Yeet
values.description:
Yeet your opponent.
A high-damage attack that puts the target in severe hitstun, but requires nearly all {st.ext_full} and {mp.ext_full} to execute.
values.moveMessage: {sender} yeets {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!

values.name: Severe Hitstun
values.noMove: {self} cannot move due to severe hitstun!
values.noCounter: {self} cannot counter due to severe hitstun!

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly yeets {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to yeet {target} but {target} blocks, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} fails to block and {sender} yeets {target}, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to yeet {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender} and {sender} yeets {target}, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A critical
{sender} quickly SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{target} fails to block and {sender} SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{target} fails to evade {sender} and {sender} SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to yeet {target} but fails, losing {move:hpF neg} {hp.ext_full}.

values.name: Star Spit
values.description: Spit your opponent as a star.
values.moveMessage: {sender} inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to inhale {target} but {target} blocks it!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} tries to block but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to inhale {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} tries to evade but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} critical damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} critical damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {target} tries to block but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} critical damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {target} tries to evade but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} critical damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to inhale {target} but {target} was not sucked in.

values.name: Dash
values.description: Dash towards your opponent in a spiraling blaze.
values.moveMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze, dealing {move:hp neg} damage and draining {move:st neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastMessage: {sender} rapidly dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze, dealing {move:hp neg} damage and draining {move:st neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze but {target} blocks, dealing only {move:hpBlock neg} damage and {move:stBlock neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage and {move:stBlockF neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a blaze but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a blaze and {target} fails to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage and {move:stEvadeF neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze, critically dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage and draining {move:stCrit neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze, critically dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage and draining {move:stCrit neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze and {target} fails to block, critically dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage and {move:stBlockFCrit neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze and {target} fails to evade, critically dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage and {move:stEvadeFCrit neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to dash towards {target} but explodes into a ball of fire, losing {move:hpF neg} {hp.ext_full}, {move:stC neg} {st.ext_full}, and {move:mpC neg} {mp.ext_full}!

values.name: Hammer
values.description: Charge up your hammer and smash down.
values.moveMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and slams it down on {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!

values.name: Hitstun
values.description: Stun from being hit by a hammer.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly charges up their hammer and slams it down on {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} blocks, slamming down for {move:hpBlock neg} damage and {move:stBlock neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} fails to block, slamming down for {move:hpBlockF neg} damage and {move:stBlockF neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer but {target} evades, making {sender} miss!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} fails to evade, slamming down for {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage and {move:stEvadeF neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and SMASHES {target} with it, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and SMASHES {target} with it, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and SMASHES through {target}'s block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage and {move:stBlockFCrit neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} was too slow to evade, SMASHING {target} for {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage and {move:stEvadeFCrit neg} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to charge their hammer but fails, losing {-(int(move.fmt('stC')) + int(move.fmt('stF')))} {st.ext_full}!

values.name: Inhale
values.fastMessage: {sender} takes a deep breath, regaining {move:hpC} {hp.ext_full} and {move:stC} {st.ext_full}.
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to take a deep breath but only gains {move:hpC} {hp.ext_full} and {int(move.fmt('stC')) + int(move.fmt('stF'))} {st.ext_full}.

values.name: Throw
values.moveMessage: {sender} throws {target} forwards for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly throws {target} forwards for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} but {target} breaks free from {sender}'s grip!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} and {target} fails to break free, getting thrown for {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} and {target} fails to evade it, getting thrown for {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} strongly throws {target} forwards for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} strongly and quickly throws {target} forwards for {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to break free from {sender}'s grab and gets strongly thrown forwards for {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender}'s grab and gets strongly thrown forwards for {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} but couldn't lift {target} up.

values.name: Kick
values.description:
An expert kick.
Deals 50 damage for 70 {st.ext_full}.
Significant bonus damage when it fails to be countered.
values.moveMessage: {sender} kicks {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly kicks {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {target} blocks {sender}'s kick, taking {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} fails to block {sender}'s kick, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {target} dodges and {sender}'s kick whiffs!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender}'s kick, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} but whiffs.

values.name: Strike
values.description:
A precise dominant arm strike.
Deals 30 damage for 40 {st.ext_full}.
Significant bonus damage when it fails to be countered.
values.moveMessage: {sender} strikes {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly strikes {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {target} blocks {sender}'s strike, taking {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} fails to block {sender}'s strike, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {target} dodges and {sender}'s strike whiffs!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender}'s strike, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} but whiffs.

values.name: Jab
values.description:
An expert punch.
Deals 20 damage for 30 {st.ext_full}.
Minor/Moderate bonus damage when it fails to be countered.
values.moveMessage: {sender} jabs {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly jabs {target} for {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {target} blocks {sender}'s jab, taking {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} fails to block {sender}'s jab, taking {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {target} dodges and {sender}'s jab whiffs!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender}'s jab, taking {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to jab {target} but whiffs.

values.name: Advance
values.fastMessage: {sender} closes in on {target}, gaining {move:stC} {st.ext_full}.

values.name: Retreat
values.description:
Close the gap.
Decreases the opponent's {st.ext_full} by 10.
values.fastMessage: {sender} retreats and {target} loses {move:st neg} {st.ext_full}.

values.name: Hold
values.fastMessage: {sender} holds, gaining {move:hpC} {hp.ext_full}.

values.name: Test Main
values.moveMessage: {sender} ran {move}, dealing {move:hp} HP, {move:st} ST, and {move:mp} MP to {target}. It costed {sender} {move:hpC} HP, {move:stC} ST, and {move:mpC} MP.
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} ran {move} and {target} failed to block, taking {move:hpBlockF} HP, {move:stBlockF} ST, and {move:mpBlockF} MP.
values.evadeMessage: {sender} ran {move} and {target} evaded it, taking {move:mpEvade} .

values.name: Test Fast
values.moveMessage: ERROR: {move} WAS COUNTERABLE
values.fastMessage: {sender} ran {move}, dealing {move:hp} HP, {move:st} ST, and {move:mp} MP to {target}. It costed {sender} {move:hpC} HP, {move:stC} ST, and {move:mpC} MP.

values.name: Test Fail
values.failureMessage: {sender} ran {move} and took {move:hpF} HP, {move:stF} ST, and {move:mpF} MP.

values.name: Test Critical
values.blockMessage: {sender} used {move} and {target} blocked it.
values.evadeMessage: {sender} used {move} and {target} evaded it.
values.criticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a critical after no counter, dealing {move:hpCrit} HP, {move:stCrit} ST, and {move:mpCrit} MP to {target}.
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a fast critical, dealing {move:hpCrit} HP, {move:stCrit} ST, and {move:mpCrit} MP to {target}.
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a critical after a failed block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit} HP, {move:stBlockFCrit} ST, and {move:mpBlockFCrit} MP to {target}.
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a critical after a failed evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit} HP, {move:stEvadeFCrit} ST, and {move:mpEvadeFCrit} MP to {target}.

values.name: ATLA Move Template
values.moveMessage: {move:hp neg}, {move:stC neg}
values.fastMessage: {move:hp neg}
values.blockMessage: {move:hpBlock neg}
values.blockFailMessage: {move:hpBlockF neg}
values.evadeMessage: {move:hpEvade neg}
values.evadeFailMessage: {move:hpEvadeF neg}
values.criticalMessage: {move:hpCrit neg}
values.fastCriticalMessage: {move:hpCrit neg}
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {move:hpBlockFCrit neg}
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg}
values.failureMessage: {move:hpF neg}

values.name: Tidal Wave
values.moveMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave against {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly summons a tidal wave against {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave and {target} blocks it, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} summons a SUPER tidal wave against {target}, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly summons a SUPER tidal wave against {target}, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} summons a SUPER tidal wave and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} summons a SUPER tidal wave and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} fails to create a tidal wave towards {target}.

values.name: Ice Shards
values.description: Send a flurry of ice shards.
values.moveMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards at {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly shoots a flurry of ice shards at {target}, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards and {target} blocks, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards but {target} evades them for {move:stEvade neg} {st.ext_full}!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to evade, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot a flurry of ice shards but fails.

values.name: Pillar Strike
values.description: Send a column of rock at your opponent.
values.moveMessage: {sender} strikes {target} with a column of rock, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a column of rock, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock and {target} blocks, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock and {target} fails to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a LARGE column of rock, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a LARGE column of rock, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} sends a LARGE column of rock and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} sends a LARGE column of rock and {target} fails to evade, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to send a column of rock but fails.

values.name: Fire Blast
values.moveMessage: {sender} blasts {target} with a meteor of flame, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} with a meteor of flame, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame and {target} blocks it, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} blasts {target} with a Sozin's Comet of flame, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} with a Sozin's Comet of flame, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a Sozin's Comet of flame and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a Sozin's Comet of flame and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot a meteor of flame but fails.

values.name: Air Blast
values.moveMessage: {sender} blasts {target} back with a burst of air, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} back with a burst of air, dealing {move:hp neg} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air at {target} who is blocking, dealing {move:hpBlock neg} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air and {target} fails to block it, dealing {move:hpBlockF neg} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeF neg} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} blasts {target} back with an EXPLOSION of air, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} back with an EXPLOSION of air, dealing {move:hpCrit neg} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} blasts an EXPLOSION of air and {target} fails to block, dealing {move:hpBlockFCrit neg} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} blasts an EXPLOSION of air and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {move:hpEvadeFCrit neg} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to fire a blast of air at {target} but fails.
